name: Meshcon
body: ### MeshCon Fashion & Tec Week Berlin 2014 The first edition of MeshCon is taking place in Berlin from October 10-15, 2014 with the topic how to reap the benefits of participatory production in the textile industry. MeshCon Berlin brings together scientists, fashion makers, designers, pattern creators, knitters, textile manipulators, programmers and DIY hardware makers. The event offers a place to exchange new ideas in personalized fashion and technologies in the garment production. Participants from across the world are expected to join the five day event at locations around Berlin city. The first day will start with a conference at the [University of Technology TU Berlin](http://tu-berlin.de). In the following days you can learn how to create your own fashion and wearables at workshops at the [Wikimedia Deutschland e.V.](http://wikimedia.de) office. We will have hackathons, developer meetups and an interactive fashion show with self-made knits and tec-cothing. We invite attendees to share their knowledge in our Open Fashion Wiki. ### Registration * Speaker Registration: Please register as a speaker or with your project on the [Speaker Form](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/viewform?usp=drive_web&formkey=dFZkNWlxTVNDUDFJbHl5aWJVb0VZeFE6MA#gid=0) * Volunteer Registration: Please fill out the form for [Volunteering](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/viewform?usp=drive_web&formkey=dGhEQ3RmRzhBdDU4TVpDQmtJTk9ua1E6MA#gid=0) *** Tickets: http://meshcon.eventbrite.com/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/events/1437460133192230/ Twitter: http://twitter.com/MeshConNet *** [FashionTec](http://fashiontec.org), MeshCon Organization Buerau, c/o FFii e.V., Malm√∂er Str. 6, 10439 Berlin, Germany Phone: +49 30 41722597 | Fax: +49 721 509663769 | Mario Behling, Phone: +49 176 24387682 | contact@meshcon.net MeshCon is licensed under a Creative Commons License.
